items.sentence: It gradually dawned on me that I'd misunderstood Tom.
Your plants wouldn't have died if you'd watered them.
If you hurry, there's a chance you can catch the bus.
That's not the only reason why Tom needed to do that.
That isn't the main reason why Tom needed to do that.
Tom and Mary grow organic vegetables in their garden.
Tom's restaurant was visited by the health inspector.
I wanted Tom to know I really didn't want to do that.
I want Tom to know he doesn't really have to do that.
Tom didn't even ask me if he could borrow my bicycle.
